isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 5000 9100 9200 9400 9900 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 5000, 5000i, 9000, 9000i - OPERATION - VOLTMETER

svcprocinfo.para: The Speedometer/Tachometer module monitors voltage levels in the feed circuit to the module.

svcsubproc.title: Voltmeter Gauge
svcsubproc.para: The Speedometer/Tachometer module monitors system voltage and outputs signals to drive the voltmeter, through connector (422) on circuits 27S(+), 27S(-), 27C(+) and 27C(-) to the left gauge cluster at connector (424). The voltmeter is a 4-pin electronically driven gauge that plugs into the gauge cluster.
